medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began experiencing abdominal pain 2 months ago, which became acutely worse in the past two days. She had previously received antibiotics for an infection in her colon two months ago that helped resolve the pain. The pain returned yesterday in the same location and is similar to her most recent episode.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic low back pain - degenerative lumbar spondylosis; Thyroid nodule; Depression; History of infectious colitis and diverticulosis.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of GI problems. Sister has a thyroid condition, details unspecified. Sister had lung cancer. Mother with cardiovascular disease. Diabetes mellitus in 3 sisters and mother.
